body_html: @soumith as of Commit 403a533 I'm still having this issue on K80s. Sending a kill signal to the script also doesn't actually kill my processes and running nvidia-smi shows me Unknown Error on the processes on GPU0 and GPU1. I have to go and kill the processes manually to get them to actually die.

body: @soumith as of Commit 403a53382754bcb17e6b818c4eb4272f4a263355 I'm still having this issue on K80s. Sending a kill signal to the script also doesn't actually kill my processes and running `nvidia-smi` shows me `Unknown Error` on the processes on GPU0 and GPU1. I have to go and kill the processes manually to get them to actually die.
